name: Juno Queen of Bingo: Surreal Lotto Style Bingo For Avid Champs FREE
name_original: Juno Queen of Bingo: Surreal Lotto Style Bingo For Avid Champs FREE
description:
Finally! The best-looking, best-sounding, and best-feeling bingo game is now available on iOS!

- FREE BINGO TICKET TO BE WON DAILY -

• Play in REAL TIME with other players!
• Timed mode at only 120 seconds, so you have to be quick!
• Experience the FUN with your Facebook friends.
• WINNING in Bingo has never been more fun and addictive.
